      Methods in org.netbeans.api.debugger that return types with arguments of type Breakpoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<Breakpoint> Breakpoint.getBreakpointsToDisable()
      Get the set of breakpoints that will be disabled after this breakpoint is hit.
      Set<Breakpoint> Breakpoint.getBreakpointsToEnable()
      Get the set of breakpoints that will be enabled after this breakpoint is hit.

      Removes breakpoint.
